metadata.inclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 7 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press the [1], [4], and [7] buttons.
metadata.exclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 7 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press the [3], [6], and [7] buttons.
metadata.reset:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [R] button for 9 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press the [1], [2], [3], [6], [5], [4], and [7] buttons.
